SEARCH
Package de.tinf.io

Class FileUtils

java.lang.Object
de.tinf.io.FileUtils
public class FileUtils extends Object
The FileUtils class provides utility methods for file operations.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • FileUtils

      public FileUtils()

  • Method Details

    • read

      public static String read(String path)
      Reads the specified file and returns its contents as a string.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file to be read
      Returns:
      the contents of the file as a string, or null in case of an exception
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an I/O error occurs reading from the file or a malformed or unmappable byte sequence is read

    • readLines

      public static String[] readLines(String path)
      Reads all lines from a file at the specified path and returns them as an array of strings.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file to be read
      Returns:
      an array of strings, each representing a line from the file
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an I/O error occurs reading from the file

    • write

      public static void write(String content, String path, boolean append)
      Writes the specified contents to the specified file.
      Parameters:
      content - the content to be written
      path - the path to the file
      append - whether the content should be appended to the file
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an I/O error occurs writing to the file

    • exists

      public static boolean exists(String path)
      Checks if a file exists at the specified path.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file
      Returns:
      true if the file exists, false otherwise

    • createFile

      public static void createFile(String path)
      Creates a file at the specified path. If the file already exists it gets cleared.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an I/O error occurs creating the file

    • delete

      public static void delete(String path)
      Deletes a file or directory at the specified path.
      Parameters:
      path - the path of the file or directory to be deleted
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an I/O error occurs while deleting the file or directory

    • appendLine

      public static void appendLine(String line, String path)
      Appends a line of text to the specified file.
      Parameters:
      line - the line of text to append
      path - the path to the file where the line should be appended
